section.title: Description
section.p: Date that an Inpatient or ShortStay Encounter was included in the Census. Census is taken 3 or 4 times a year at 11:59 pm. Only those Encounters that are active (admitted), at the time the Census Event triggers receive a date timestamps.

stentry.p: This field contains the date the census was taken for this Encounter

Inpatient Encounter was included in the Census. Census is taken 3 or 4 times a year at 11:59 pm. Only those Encounters that are active (admitted), at the time the Census Event triggers receive a date timestamps.

ShortStay Encounter was included in the Census. Census is taken 3 or 4 times a year at 11:59 pm. Only those Encounters that are active (admitted), at the time the Census Event triggers receive a date timestamps.
